targets.rawSql:
select
  $__time("date"),
  value as " ",
  c.shortname || 'S' || ot.type as "band"
from
  sig2noise
  inner join station s on sig2noise.station_id = s.id
  inner join constellation c on c.id = sig2noise.constellation_id
  inner join observation_type ot on sig2noise.observation_type_id = ot.id
  inner join station_network sn on sig2noise.station_id = sn.station_id
  inner join network n on sn.network_id = n.id
where
  $__timeFilter("date")
  and s.fullname = '$station'
  and c.fullname in (${constellation:sqlstring})
  and ot.type in (${observation_type:sqlstring})
  and n.name = '$network'
order by
  band desc;

select
  $__time("date"),
  value as " ",
  c.shortname || 'M' || ot.type as "band"
from
  multipath mp
  inner join station s on mp.station_id = s.id
  inner join constellation c on c.id = mp.constellation_id
  inner join observation_type ot on mp.observation_type_id = ot.id
  inner join station_network sn on mp.station_id = sn.station_id
  inner join network n on sn.network_id = n.id
where
  $__timeFilter("date")
  and s.fullname = '$station'
  and c.fullname in (${constellation:sqlstring})
  and ot.type in (${observation_type:sqlstring})
  and n.name = '$network'
order by
  band desc;

select
  $__time("date"),
  value as " ",
  c.fullname
from
  observation_cs
  inner join station s on observation_cs.station_id = s.id
  inner join constellation c on c.id = observation_cs.constellation_id
  inner join station_network sn on observation_cs.station_id = sn.station_id
  inner join network n on sn.network_id = n.id
where
  $__timeFilter("date")
  and s.fullname = '$station'
  and c.fullname in (${constellation:sqlstring})
  and n.name = '$network'
order by
  value desc;

select
  $__time("date"),
  value as " ",
  c.fullname
from
  satellite_cs
  inner join station s on satellite_cs.station_id = s.id
  inner join constellation c on c.id = satellite_cs.constellation_id
  inner join station_network sn on satellite_cs.station_id = sn.station_id
  inner join network n on sn.network_id = n.id
where
  $__timeFilter("date")
  and s.fullname = '$station'
  and c.fullname in (${constellation:sqlstring})
  and n.name = '$network'
order by
  value desc;

options.content:
# Graph sources

- Graphs are generated from the data quality metrics xtr files available at: [https://renag.resif.fr/pub/quality-check/full/](https://renag.resif.fr/pub/quality-check/full/)
- The data quality metrics have been computed at the [RESIF-RENAG data center](https://doi.org/10.17616/R31NJN5L) using the [G-Nut/Anubis](https://gnutsoftware.com/software/anubis/) software
- Input files and the daily RINEX 3 observation files available from: [https://renag.resif.fr/pub/rinex3/](https://renag.resif.fr/pub/rinex3/)

# Explanations

## Carrier-phase signal-to-noise ratio (dB-Hz)

Signal strength of the modulated signal.

## Pseudo-range multipath (cm)

Elongation of the signal arriving indirectly at the GNSS antenna.

## Observation cycle slips (%)

Observation tracking interruption rate.

## Satellite cycle slips (%)

Satellite tracking interruption rate.

targets.rawSql:
select
  shortname as name,
  -- n.name as network,
  lat,
  case
    when long > 180 then long - 360
    else long
  end as long,
  case
    when fullname != '$station' then 0
    when fullname = '$station' then 80
  end as color
from
  station
  inner join station_network sn on station.id = sn.station_id
  inner join network n on n.id = sn.network_id
where n.name = '$network';

list.definition:
select s.fullname
from station s
inner join station_network sn on s.id = sn.station_id
inner join network n on n.id = sn.network_id
where n.name = '$network';
list.label: Select station
list.name: station
list.query:

inner join station_network sn on s.id = sn.station_id
inner join network n on n.id = sn.network_id
where n.name = '$network';
